description: This dataset is no longer updated. For updated datasets please search for "Registered with the Cook County Department of Revenue." This dataset may be removed in the future. A listing of the businesses in unincorporated Cook County subject to Liquor, Gasoline, New Motor Vehicle, Dealer Use, Diesel, Amusement, and Parking Home Rule Taxes. Data last updated September 08, 2011
